```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
data_1962 <- gapminder %>% 
  filter(year == 1962, continent %in% c("Africa", "Americas", "Asia")) 

ggplot(data_1962, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, size = pop, color = continent)) +
  labs(x = "GDP Per Capita", y = "Life Expectancy", title = "The World Gets Better Every Year") +
  geom_point(alpha = .5) +
  scale_x_log10(labels = c("$1,000", "$10,000"), breaks = c(1000, 10000)) +
  facet_wrap(~ continent)
```
